header.title: Super Brain Game Hub
header.subtitle: Select a game to challenge your brain

home.aboutDescription: Welcome to Super Brain Game Hub, a collection of brain-training games designed to challenge your cognitive skills. Each game targets different aspects of mental ability, from memory and pattern recognition to mathematical prowess and quick reflexes.

blackWhiteTiles.title: Black White Tiles
blackWhiteTiles.subtitle: Toggle the tiles to match the target pattern

instructions.toggle: Click on tiles in your board to toggle that tile and its adjacent tiles
instructions.goal: Your goal is to match the target pattern exactly
instructions.solvable: Each target pattern is guaranteed to be solvable
instructions.undo: Use the Undo button to revert your last move if needed
instructions.fewerMoves: Try to complete the puzzle in as few moves as possible

digitalLabyrinth.title: Digital Labyrinth
digitalLabyrinth.subtitle: Connect the numbers from 1 to 81 by filling in the missing tiles

instructions.fillBlanks: Fill in the blank tiles with numbers from 1 to 81
instructions.sequential: Each number must be connected (horizontally, vertically, or diagonally) to its sequential neighbors
instructions.noRepeat: Each number can only be used once
instructions.complete: All tiles must be filled to complete the puzzle

numberPuzzle.title: Number Puzzle
numberPuzzle.subtitle: Solve the sliding number puzzle by rearranging the tiles
numberPuzzle.congratulations: Congratulations! You solved the puzzle in {moves} moves!

instructions.slideTiles: Slide tiles by clicking on any tile adjacent to the empty space
instructions.arrangeNumbers: Arrange the numbers in order from 1 to {totalTiles}
instructions.emptySpace: The empty space should end up in the bottom right corner
instructions.fewerMoves: Try to solve the puzzle in as few moves as possible
instructions.changeDifficulty: Change the grid size to increase or decrease difficulty

gameOfLife.title: Conway's Game of Life
gameOfLife.subtitle: Predict the next state of cells based on Conway's Game of Life rules
gameOfLife.perfectPrediction: Perfect! You predicted the next state correctly!

instructions.leftBoard: The left board shows the current state of Conway's Game of Life at time step t.
instructions.yourTask: Your task is to predict the next state at time step t+1 on the right board by clicking cells to toggle them between alive (black) and dead (white).
instructions.evolution: After each round, the solution becomes the new initial state for the next round, allowing you to follow the evolution of patterns over time.

rules.title: The rules of Conway's Game of Life (B3/S23) are:
rules.survive: Any live cell with 2 or 3 live neighbors survives to the next generation.
rules.birth: Any dead cell with exactly 3 live neighbors becomes alive in the next generation.
rules.death: All other cells die or remain dead in the next generation.

instructions.verification: Turn on verification mode to see if your alive cells are placed correctly (green) or incorrectly (red).

colors.title: After submitting your prediction, colors will show your performance:
colors.orange: Orange: Missed live cells (cells that should be alive)

instructions.hover: Hover over a cell to highlight its corresponding position in both boards.

rapidCalculation.title: Rapid Calculation
rapidCalculation.subtitle: Test your math skills by adding numbers that appear briefly on screen!
rapidCalculation.instructions: Add numbers that appear for a brief time each.
rapidCalculation.enterSum: Enter the sum of all numbers:

instructions_details.watch: Watch as numbers appear on screen one by one
instructions_details.remember: Each number appears for only a short time
instructions_details.add: Add all the numbers in your head
instructions_details.practice: Practice to improve your mental math skills
